Place mathifold_boy_surface.py under your Blender installation folder in:

	Blender\2.77\scripts\presets\operator\mesh.primitive_xyz_function_surface\mathifold_boy_surface.py

To Embeded WebGL HTML files in a webpage use something like:
	
	<iframe width="800" height="500" allowfullscreen src="relative/path/to/file.html"></iframe>
